title: Easy Pasta Salad
instructions: Boil water in a large pot, adding a pinch of salt.
Once the water reaches a rolling boil, add the pasta and cook for about 6 minutes or until al dente.
Drain the pasta and rinse it under cold water to stop the cooking process.
In a large bowl, combine the pasta with chopped tomatoes, diced cheese, and a drizzle of olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper to taste, and toss everything together until well mixed.
Serve chilled or at room temperature and enjoy!
additionalTips: Add some basil for extra flavor.

title: Budget-Friendly Stir Fry
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions and set aside.
Heat a tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add minced garlic and stir for about 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add your choice of vegetables (like bell peppers, broccoli, or carrots) and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until tender.
If using, add cooked chicken pieces and stir until heated through.
Pour soy sauce over the mixture and stir well to combine.
Serve the stir-fry over the cooked rice.
additionalTips: Try using tofu for a vegan option.

title: Quick Veggie Wrap
instructions: Lay the tortilla flat on a clean surface.
Spread a generous layer of hummus across the tortilla.
Add a layer of lettuce, followed by slices of tomato and cheese.
Roll the tortilla tightly, starting from one edge, to form a wrap.
Cut in half diagonally and serve immediately.
additionalTips: Add some avocado for a creamier texture.

title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread to your desired crispness.
In a small bowl, mash the avocado with a fork and season with salt and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado generously over the toasted bread.
Drizzle with olive oil for added flavor.
Optional: Top with cherry tomatoes or a poached egg before serving.
additionalTips: Top with cherry tomatoes or a poached egg.

title: Microwave Mug Cake
instructions: In a microwave-safe mug, combine flour, sugar, cocoa powder, and a pinch of salt.
Add milk and vegetable oil, mixing until smooth.
Microwave on high for 1 minute, watching closely to prevent overflow.
Allow to cool for a few minutes before enjoying directly from the mug.
additionalTips: Add chocolate chips for extra sweetness.

title: Simple Omelette
instructions: In a bowl, beat the eggs until well mixed, adding salt and pepper to taste.
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and melt butter.
Pour the eggs into the skillet, tilting to spread them evenly.
As the edges begin to set, gently lift them with a spatula, allowing uncooked egg to flow underneath.
Once almost set, sprinkle cheese on one half and fold the omelette.
Cook for an additional minute until cheese is melted, then serve.
additionalTips: Add veggies or ham for extra flavor.

title: Chicken Quesadilla
instructions: Place a tortilla in a skillet over medium heat.
Spread a layer of cheese on half of the tortilla.
Add cooked chicken pieces and some salsa on top of the cheese.
Fold the tortilla over and cook for 2-3 minutes until the cheese melts.
Flip carefully and cook for another 1-2 minutes until golden brown.
Cut into wedges and serve with additional salsa on the side.
additionalTips: Serve with guacamole or sour cream.

title: Vegetable Soup
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
In a large pot, heat broth over medium heat until simmering.
Add chopped vegetables and cook for about 20-25 minutes until tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
For added heartiness, consider adding beans or small pasta.
additionalTips: Add beans or pasta for a heartier soup.

title: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine banana, strawberries, yogurt, milk, and honey.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
If the mixture is too thick, add more milk to reach desired consistency.
Pour into a glass and enjoy immediately.
additionalTips: Add protein powder for an energy boost.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter one side of each slice of bread.
Place one slice butter-side down in a skillet over medium heat.
Add cheese on top and cover with the second slice, butter-side up.
Cook for about 2-4 minutes until golden brown, then flip carefully.
Cook the other side until cheese is melted and bread is golden brown.
Cut in half and serve hot.
additionalTips: Add tomato or ham for extra flavor.
